title: VA - Omid - Beneath The Surface (1999 Hip Hop)
description:
1	Orion South & Phoenix Orion 	Beneath The Surface (4:26)
2	Aceyalone , P.E.A.C.E. & Self Jupiter 	When The Sun Took A Day Off And The Moon Stood Still (5:04)
3	Blackbyrd* , Rakaa-Iriscience , St. Mark 9:23 & Xololanxinxo 	Who&#039;s Keeping Time? (5:12)
4	Sesquipedalien 	Hazardous Curves (3:59)
5	Circus & Of Mexican Descent 	Night And Day (3:38)
6	DK Toon & Ellay Khule 	Sunny Side Up (3:08)
7	J-Smoov & St. Mark 9:23 	Line Postin&#039; In Pedro (5:47)
8	All Deadly Jizzm* , Awol One , Circus , Radioinactive & Xololanxinxo 	Farmers Market Of The Beast (9:16)
9	2Mex , Ellay Khule & Wreccless 	BustMustJustUs (3:28)
10	Adlib (2) , Okito & Zagu Brown 	Subterranean Service (4:26)
11	H.I.M.N.L. 	For Her Souly, Slowly, Solely (6:17)
12	Puzoozoo Watt , Slant & Vixxen 	(in)sense (3:16)
13	P.E.A.C.E. 	You Are In My Clutches (4:36)
14.1	Adlib (2) , Sach & Zagu Brown 	To The Turn Of The Earth (8:55)
14.2	Awol One 	Little Piece Of Heaven


On this project you&#039;ll find producer Omid Walizadeh (aka OD, Omid) collaborating with some of the best MCs in the California underground, including members of Freestyle Fellowship, OMD, Shapeshifters, Hip Hop Klan, and Global Phlowtations among others. The songs are filled with engaging story-telling, conscious lyrics and psychedelic, moody beats which make this compilation an excellent deep-listening experience. Beneath the Surface is one of my favorite hiphop albums, and I&#039;d say it&#039;s nearly essential to track down a copy.
